rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall leading to a living area, designed according to Vastu principles with an auspicious color palette and proper directional alignment.
Open-plan living room that merges seamlessly with the kitchen, featuring colonial design elements like wooden paneling and decorative moldings.
Open-plan kitchen integrated into the living area. The layout is designed for efficient workflow while incorporating a small prep counter facing east to align with Vastu.

Multi-functional family room that doubles as a library, featuring built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating. Designed with attention to light and ventilation following local building norms and Vastu recommendations for knowledge areas.
Guest bedroom with colonial detailing and adequate natural lighting from south windows, providing a serene space for visitors.
Spacious master bedroom located in the north-eastern section to promote positive energy according to Vastu. It features an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet.
Cozy children's room designed for safety and comfort, with vibrant decor while aligning with local building standards.
Additional guest bedroom or utility room ensuring flexibility in design. Suitable for storage and occasional use.

openings.description: Main door facing the south-west corner to ensure auspicious entry as per Vastu principles, with a welcoming canopy design.
Large windows in the living room and kitchen area for ample natural light, positioned according to Vastu to enhance energy flow.
Safety exit door from the kitchen, aligned with building norms to ensure quick evacuation if necessary.

rooms.description: Dedicated home theater room designed for optimal acoustics and viewing experience, incorporating colonial aesthetics with modern technology.
Spatiot that offers an outdoor relaxation area with garden access, designed to enhance the overall living experience while adhering to building norms.

openings.description: Central staircase connecting ground and first floor, designed in a colonial style with durable materials for safety and aesthetic appeal.
Window for natural light to complement the home theater ambiance without compromising acoustic performance.
